quote: “We all need to be mocked from time to time, lest we take ourselves too seriously.”
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: “the time is always right to do the right thing”
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: “Friendship with oneself is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.”
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: “I'm going to paraphrase Thoreau here... rather than love, than money, than faith, than fame, than fairness... give me truth. ”
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: “It doesn’t matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “The place God calls you to is the place where your deep gladness and the world’s deep hunger meet.”
author: Frederick Buechner

quote: “When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.”
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: “I offer you peace. I offer you love. I offer you friendship. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings.”
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: “You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.”
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: “The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.”
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: “I am always doing that which I can not do, in order that I may learn how to do it.”
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: “The truth knocks on the door and you say, "Go away, I'm looking for the truth," and so it goes away. Puzzling.”
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: “I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.”
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: “People have only as much liberty as they have the intelligence to want and the courage to take.”
author: Emma Goldman

quote: “We don't receive wisdom; we must discover it for ourselves after a journey that no one can take for us or spare us.”
author: Marcel Proust

quote: “Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.”
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: “The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.”
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: “If we all did the things we are really capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.”
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: “Before, I wanted to say: "I found love!" But now, I want to say: "I found a person. And he belongs to me and I belong to him.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “The only limits for tomorrow are the doubts we have today.”
author: Pittacus Lore
